data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Cyril Ngonge puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 22, Ola John instrumental with a fine assist.
Finn Stokkers puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Ola John.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Ron Jans (Enschede) is making a first substitution, with Luka Ilic replacing Jesse Bosch.
In the minute 46, Lennerd Daneels is replacing Ola John for the away team.
Julio Pleguezuelo (Enschede) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Alexander Jeremejeff is replacing Danilo for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 63, Ron Jans is making the team's third substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Lazaros Lamprou replacing Halil Dervisoglu.
The home team replace Godfried Roemeratoe with Ramiz Zerrouki.
Enschede's Ramiz Zerrouki has been booked in Enschede.
In the minute 70, Waalwijk make their second substitution with Ayman Azhil replacing Anas Tahiri.
Kik Pierie (Enschede) has received a first yellow card.
Thierry Lutonda is on a sub for Paul Quasten for Waalwijk.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Cyril Ngonge with Jurien Gaari.
Hans Mulder is replacing Finn Stokkers for the away team.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Vaclav Cerny for Enschede has been booked by Richard Martens and receives a first yellow card.
